title: Question about recording
body: I just recorded a game, but after I open the .webm file, it was only an audio file, no the video, what should I do?

replies.body:
What are you opening the file with? If you open it with any Chromium-based web browser (Chrome, Opera) it should play just fine. [VLC media player](http://www.videolan.org/vlc/) also plays the .webm files just fine.

Let me know if you have any questions.
